column.name: dataset_pid
column.remarks: The persistent id for the dataset

column.name: dataset_link
column.remarks: The persistent url for the dataset

column.name: dataset_size
column.remarks: The current size of the dataset in GB for the dataset

column.name: storage_location
column.remarks: Can be either 'internal' or 'external' to the institution.

table.name: department
table.remarks: Describes a department within a faculty. The combination of institution id, faculty id and name must be unique.

column.name: dmp_source_system
column.remarks: Describes the source system for the data management plan, e.g. 'DMPonline'.

column.name: dmp_ss_pid
column.remarks: The DMP source system persistent identifier for this data management plan.

column.name: dmp_state
column.remarks: Some funders require multiple iterations of data management plan development, this integer field is used to identify the state.

column.name: dmp_status
column.remarks: The DMP status, can be one of 'none', 'new', 'in progress', 'completed', 'verified'.

table.name: faculty
table.remarks: Describes a faculty, the combination of the institution id and the faculty name must be unique.

table.name: funder_dmp_states
table.remarks: Describes the states that a funder specifies for DMPs

table.name: inst_storage_costs
table.remarks: Describes storage costs for institutional storage platforms

column.name: cris_sys
column.remarks: A description of the CRIS system in use at this institution, e.g. 'Pure'.

column.name: pub_sys
column.remarks: A description of the publication repository system in use at this institution e.g. 'Eprints'.

column.name: funder_project_code
column.remarks: A code assigned to the project by the funding body, it may be null if the funding application is in process.

column.name: is_awarded
column.remarks: Is 'true' if funding has been successfully applied for, 'false' otherwise

column.name: has_dmp
column.remarks: Is 'true' if a DMP exists, 'false' otherwise.

column.name: has_dmp_been_reviewed
column.remarks: Is 'true' if a DMP exists and has been reviewed, 'false' otherwise.

column.name: expected_storage
column.remarks: The amount of storage in GB this project is expecting to need to use on storage platform <sc_id>.

column.name: project_id
column.remarks: The institution project identifier

column.name: cris_id
column.remarks: The institution repository identifier

column.name: repo_id
column.remarks: The institution repository identifier

column.name: publication_pid
column.remarks: The persistent identifier, e.g. a DOI, for the publication

column.name: data_access_statement
column.remarks: Describes the state of the publications Data Access Statement. Permissible values are 'exists with no dataset', 'does not exist', 'exists without link', 'exists with link', 'exists with persistent link'
